channel.title: How do you edit your server?
channel.description:
How do you edit your server? I don't mean put NPC's onto the game, I mean literally edit your game, like edit your IP, the Login-screen, and everything else.
Please help, I know that if somebody can help me with this I can really make a good server for all to enjoy.

item.title: How do you edit your server?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

This is in the wrong section, RS2 Private server stuff is for Moparscape.org,
Here is the client hacking board: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,91.0.html

Hope it helps.
If not, Ask there

Read full topic
item.source: How do you edit your server?
